name: 09-recipe-building-stream-pipeline
description: Node.js core **stream** module provides a **pipeline()** method. Similar to how we can use the Node.js core stream **pipe()** method to pipe one stream to another. We can also use **pipeline()** to chain multiple streams together.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
